item.description:
Come on down to the 'Den for a tournament of Red Dragon Inn. A great game based on an adventuring party hanging around an inn after a long day of monster slaying. Use cards to drink, gamble and rough-house with each other. Last one standing wins.

It's an easy game to pick up and we'll have a few demo rounds to make sure everyone is in the swing of it. Registration starts at noon and hopefully the event will begin around 1.

The grand prize for the night is a Bag of Gold! We have a leather coin-purse filled with $100 in gold US dollar coins!

Tell your friends and stop on by for a great day and a cool prize.
item.name: Red Dragon Inn -Win a Bag of Gold Event!
